entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Lorraine
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:01 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: A few flurries. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending early this evening then partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness near noon then snow beginning late in the afternoon. Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Local blowing snow overnight. Amount 20 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature rising to minus 4 by morning. Wind chill minus 16 in the evening and minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 24 January 2023
